channel.title: Base is PI Help!
channel.description: well what i'm adding is a way to get a donator status with out someone having to use a command like ::givedonor... But how do I add if they click this button they get a screen or dialogue that ask them are they sure they want this / then they pick yes or no... no get the status? please help and if you could be specific if you know how to do it..

item.title: Base is PI Help!
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Ohhh I see, hmmm, well maybe you could like send them an activation code? And whenever they do a command such as, ::code (the activation code here) and then whenever they do that it gives them donator status. I’ll try to come up with a command like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Base is PI Help!
item.dc:creator: @omgomgomgl omgomgomgl
item.description:
@omgomgomgl wrote:

Na I add donator credits so when the accept it will be withdrawed from the credits they payed for. but need to have a option do pop up to make sure they dont miss click and lose the donor points…

Read full topic

item.title: Base is PI Help!
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Wait, then couldn’t anybody be a donator just by clicking yes?
